api.name: gs.Scene
api.description: Creates a new Genesis simulation scene with physics and rendering capabilities.
api.parameters: renderer: Renderer instance (RayTracer or Rasterizer), show_viewer: bool, sim_options: SimOptions

api.name: gs.renderers.RayTracer
api.description: Path tracing renderer for photorealistic rendering with global illumination.
api.parameters: lights: list of dicts with pos, color, intensity, radius; env_radius: float; logging_level: str

api.name: gs.renderers.Rasterizer
api.description: Real-time rasterizer with PBR materials for faster rendering.

api.name: scene.add_camera
api.description: Adds a camera to the scene for rendering with options for depth of field and ray tracing quality.
api.parameters: res: (width, height), fov: degrees, pos: (x,y,z), lookat: (x,y,z), model: "pinhole" or "thinlens", spp: samples per pixel, aperture: f-stop, focus_dist: float or None, denoise: bool
api.example: camera = scene.add_camera(model="thinlens", spp=256, aperture=2.8, denoise=True, res=(1920, 1080), fov=40, pos=(8, 6, 8), lookat=(0, 2, 0))

api.name: PBR_Materials
api.description: Physically Based Rendering materials use metallic-roughness workflow with color, metallic (0-1), roughness (0-1), opacity (0-1), and emissive properties.
api.parameters: color: RGB (0-1), metallic: 0=dielectric 1=metal, roughness: 0=smooth 1=rough, opacity: 0=transparent 1=opaque, emissive: RGB self-illumination
api.example: Glossy car paint: color=(0.8, 0.1, 0.1), metallic=0.9, roughness=0.2; Matte plastic: metallic=0.0, roughness=0.8; Glass: metallic=0.0, roughness=0.0, opacity=0.1
